summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of BLACK SYNDICATE website. All major functionality working correctly with dark theme, electric effects, and responsive design.

ui_bugs.issue: Copyright year shows 2026 instead of expected 2025

Hero section title, subtitle, description display
Hero CTA button navigation to categories
All 8 category cards with electric hover effects

Carousel dots and CTA button functionality
Contact section WhatsApp and Telegram buttons
Footer logo, social media links, and navigation

Dark theme with purple/blue neon colors
Responsive layout for mobile and desktop
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Update copyright year calculation in Footer component to show correct year (currently shows 2026 instead of 2025)
success_percentage: frontend: 98% (1 minor issue out of 18+ tested features)
